pr_title: CLDR-13488 Make final changes in data, to change colon to AND

timeline.message: CLDR-13488 Make final changes in data, to change colon to AND

timeline.author: sffc

replies.bodyText: Good catch; the tests are not updated to check for that.
replies.author: macchiati

replies.bodyText: Fixed it; turns out that it was dead code; found another piece of dead code also.
replies.author: macchiati

timeline.message: CLDR-13488 Fixed "-and" issue. Turns out that was dead code, since it was just to help in transitioning from >foot inch< data. Also found one other piece of dead wood. We started out with reciprocal as an attribute, but it turns out that a difference solution was needed (inverse quantities).
